charges.charge_description: 18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES Robbery, Bank Conspiracy (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 Months Imprisonment on Count 1 and 100 Months Imprisonment on Count 2 to run concurrent with each other; 3 Years Supervised Release; $9, 400.00 Restitution to First National Bank of Blytheville; and $100 Special Assessment (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:2113D.F BANK ROBBERY, ASSAULT WITH A DEADLY WEAPON (2)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 Months Imprisonment on Count 1 and 100 Months Imprisonment on Count 2 to run concurrent with each other; 3 Years Supervised Release; $9, 400.00 Restitution to First National Bank of Blytheville; and $100 Special Assessment (2)
